review: Good thing but it took a day to install it in the hotel (see below).You can share from several apps only.For Windows there is a workaround - you can share from chrome specific tab or the whole desktop---------------------Hotels often have additional authorization to wifi and chromecast CANNOT deal with it.I searched how to resolve it but did it by myself:1. on laptop download app which can create a wifi hotspot (not every works. For me Connectivity works great)2. connect to your Chromecast from another device (I used my android phone) using the hotspot from you laptopYou cannot connect to chromecast from laptop because during installation chromecast app temporary disconnects all other connections.After initial installation will be done you can use your laptop to connect to chromecast too.
